body.name: Bellamy's Organic, Step 1 Infant Formula, 0-6m
features: Nutritionally complete and scientifically advanced formula. Assessed by FDA as safe and nutritious for US infants.
Premium ingredients: contains essential vitamins, minerals, nutrients, DHA and prebiotics.
Formulated to support digestive and immune systems and cognitive function
No pesticides, artificial fertilisers, growth hormones, antibiotics and non GMO. No added sucrose, flavours, colours or preservatives.
Australian dual certified organic. Australia’s #1 Organic Infant Formula Brand* *Data from IQVIA, National data, 52 weeks to June 2022
body.description: Bellamy’s Organic Step 1 Infant Formula is nutritionally complete and professionally formulated with scientifically advanced ingredients to support your baby’s progress from birth through to 6 months of age. It's made from certified organic cows’ milk, blended with essential vitamins, minerals and nutrients to ensure your baby received high quality and safe nutrition. Made with Australian organic milk and clean label with no artificial growth hormones and non-GMO.

productInformation.name: Specification Met
productInformation.value: Assessed by FDA as safe and nutritious for US infants., ACO

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Contains essential vitamins, minerals and nutrients Premium & non GMO ingredients No added flavors, colors or preservatives

Step 1 Infant Formula - Feeding Guide Conversion Chart Metric (Mls) to Imperial Conversion (Oz) 1 scoop = 0.31 oz (8.8 g) of powder. The Feeding Table is only a general guide. Your baby may need more or less than indicated. Note: Consumption of vitamin or mineral preparations are not necessary in addition to this product. Discard any unfinished feed. Use only the enclosed scoop. Always add one level scoop (0.31 oz / 8.8 g) of powder to each 2 fl oz of cooled, boiled drinking water. Each bottle should be prepared individually.

How to transition How to transition to Bellamy's Organic Infant Formula If possible, we do recommend to slowly introduce small amounts of Bellamy’s Organic Formula following the guide above and slowly increasing the amount of the new formula over time. However we understand this is not possible in many circumstances. If you do not have any remaining of your usual formula and need to transition from another brand to Bellamy’s Organic Infant Formula Step 1 and Bellamy’s Organic Follow-on Formula Step 2 , you can commence straight away! Most babies do just fine and transition across easily. Be patient though, since it may take some time for your baby to get used to it. .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just like Bubs
reviews.reviewText: It's loose and dry and mixes well like Bubs. It's much cheaper than Bubs as well. I like it more than other brands for spit up and gas. Its as good or better than Atamil and Similac 360, the simple ingredients are way better for peice of mind. It's waaay better than any Enfamil. It mixes better than Earth's Best Gentle and I saw no difference in spit up or gas going from that directly to this.

reviews.reviewerName: Can anyone find the step 2 on Amazon???? I can’t and my baby is about to turn 6 months! What do I do?! This has been the ONLY formula to work for him…Can anyone find the step 2 on Amazon???? I can’t and my baby is about to turn 6 months! What do I do?! This has been the ONLY formula to work for him…
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love it! It’s been the only one to work for our baby. But he is almost 6 months old so we really need the 6-12 month formula and I can’t find it anywhere!!! Help!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We’ve been looking for an affordable organic formula forever now and decided to try this kind. I LOVE it and my baby does so good on it. My 6th can is out for delivery now, I ordered late last night. It always comes so fast! It actually smells like powdered milk vs that nasty formula smell, and it’s very fine grain vs other brands that stay clumped together. Definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My daughter loves it!
reviews.reviewText: After trying many formulas (regular and sensitive Similac, earths organic, kendamil), this one tops it! So far my 4m old daughter is doing good on it. Not as gassy, no spit ups and less fussy. The formula has a clean smell and not a funky odor like others. Noticed the texture is smoother and mixes well. Just wish there is more than one place who carries it especially in stores. So far I can only find it on Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My baby loves Bellamy Organics formula! The plan was to always breastfeed but my milk didn’t come in by the third day and my girl lost over 10% of her birth weight so I immediately supplemented with this formula (I had it on my registry for this very reason). She took to it right away, she’s 6 months now and I still supplement with it. Unfortunately Amazon doesn’t carry the stage 2 so I will need to look at another brand soon because I can’t find it anywhere else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best formula by a country mile
reviews.reviewText: I have tried SO many formulas with my 4 month old son. I’ve tried Enfamil, Similac, Gerbers, Baby’s Only, Kendamil, everything under the sun. While he merely tolerated most of them, he actively -enjoys- Bellamy’s. He polishes the bottle clean with no leftovers, but he doesn’t get overly hungry like he does with some others.The formula itself smells fresh, which is almost unheard of for formula. It tastes much better than its competitors (including to moms if they feel like having a taste). Something notable about the powder is how fine grained it is, which makes it very easy to mix with very minimal effort, and makes a can last longer. It’s not sticky, or smelly. I love that it’s natural and doesn’t include all those icky additives and oils that American brands stuff into their baby food.I have no complaints about this formula and I’m so happy I found it after a long search. My baby reacts so well to it and loves it. Any parent is is on a quest to find the perfect formula, which takes forever and is so expensive and demoralizing, owes it to themselves to try Bellamy’s

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best formula for my picky constipated eater
reviews.reviewText: After I got really sick and couldn't nurse anymore, I tried several store bought brands first organics, then non organics. My baby either didn't like it or got constipated after the first bottle. I found this one online hoping to reserve expensive brands for last, and it's great! She loves it and is not constipated. I just wish the Bellamy's organic 2nd would come back in stock, I've had to go back to the infant 1st because it's been out of stock. Although she likes it just fine, I suppose I can just use liquid multivitamin added in a long with her food.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: tastes good with better ingredients than a lot of mainstream formula. the formula doesn't bubble a lot when shaken, which I love! my baby likes it and she's drinking a lot less air.

reviews.reviewTitle: Organic formula that my baby loves
reviews.reviewText: My baby has used this formula since birth for mixed feeding. It lasts ages, as it’s 1 scoop per 60mls of water. Hard to buy in store, so I found it online for the same price, just no hassle having to go to different shops. Fast delivery, ordered on a Saturday and it came the next day.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great - I like the large serving spoon
reviews.reviewText: As a dad running on 2 hours sleep, having to dispense 2 scoops instead of 4 (like Nan) is much easier to keep track of. You’d think it’s not a big difference, but some mornings I can barely open my eyes. The big scoops means I just have to count to 1 in the first month and 2 in the second. Easy.

reviews.reviewTitle: Remove the flavour option as adults purchasing product do not drink baby formula.
reviews.reviewText: As described and delivered promptly well done

reviews.reviewTitle: Good price and always in stock
reviews.reviewText: stock availability is good. No complaints whatsoever ! baby loves this milky
